name: Grimm Escape
description:
Grimm Escape explores the story of a person being transported to a strange new land, meeting strange characters that  belong to the stories of The Brothers Grimm. As for this, the main character meets the familiar faces from the story of The Little Red Riding Hood, trying to fit in with the towns people while finding out clues of the reason he was sent to this strange world.

Game made by Atomic Kaiju which consists of 1 Game Designer, 1 Artist & 4 Game Programmers.
